Action.author: tylerq
Action.body: ~nage We are building this in the consumer team, is there ledger work for furthering this implementation which means we should keep this story? I think it should be closed.

Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: Agent work has moved from the Indy project to Aries. There is some question about whether there is a need for a CLI agent, or whether the Agent-Toolbox meets the same need.
